articles.title: Singer Ifunanya Nwangene Dies after Snake Bite, Emmy Kosgei Exposes Rogue Nairobi Pastors
articles.source: Breaking NEWS in KENYA for Today Right Now & Kenyan News | TUKO
articles.description: Emmy Kosgei narrated how some preachers in Nairobi are surviving. She joined a list of personalities who trended this week as highlighted by TUKO.co.ke.
articles.content: <ul><li>Nigerian singer Ifunanya Nwangene puzzled many after she died following a snake bite, and things took a drastic turn when another serpent was found under an ambulance carrying her remains</li… [+5911 chars]

articles.title: KRA to launch digital staff management system to boost service delivery, enhance transparency
articles.description: The Kenya Revenue Authority (KRA) is set to roll out the Staff Management System to oversee how its officers work with the public, in a shift aimed at speeding up assistance, tightening oversight, and building trust with taxpayers.
